title: NASA React Fetcher
Description: This project is a tool created to access the publically accessible NASA API. I love NASA, that's why and there is lots of cool API stuff I want to show people who aren't techie. From pulling the lastest image of earth to satellite locating and plotting, it's here!

title: AWS S3 Airspace Simulator
Description: This is created to use AWS buckets on the storage service s3! It will be a flight sync system for virtual planes to AWS servers.

title: Heart Disease Prediction
Description: I consider this my magnum opus of artificial intelligence. Notability in this project I have created a KNN imputer to repair the data. Hypothesis - Is it possible to predict heart disease events?

title: TypeScript DataChanger
Description: Project to learn TypeScript. This is adapted from an original JavaScript project to learn JavaScript.

title: New York Taxi Data Processing Project
Description: This is a data analysis project with Taxi data from New York. This was worked on with 3 great team members from around the globe! This project is focused on both the analysis and the application to the business itself.

title: Data science prediction for SmartBuild
Description: Using data to create models to predict the quality of products based on input parameters.  This project is focused on both the prediction models and the application to the business itself.

title: Nuclear Craft OpenComputer Mainframes Minecraft
Description: I have created a virtual mainframe for a modded version of the game Minecraft. This code is designed to be a multi-nuclear reactor, gas turbine and backup-diesel electrical automatic system manager.

title: Student covid data analysis
Description: I created this project using data analysis techniques to understand student needs. This is deeply around the discussion around remote learning amoung other questions.

title: AWS DeepRacer Project
Description: I have competed in an AI team robot racing competition by Amazon Web Services. Our model was not working on the day, so under a lot of pressure I wrote the current script that landed us 2nd place.

title: GovHack 2019 Team io Localé
Description: Awards: StatsNZ Innovation Award, Dean’s Special Award, Civil Defence best Use of Data in a Civil Emergency, Proaxiom Getting Around 2nd place. - Localé is a tourism based application designed to better connect visitors to local businesses and events in a safe and stress free manner. Localé will also include local area safety and evacuation information to improve community safety. Data generated can be feed back to the council to aid in council and civil defense planning. The end goal of our idea is to have a well designed app with a great user experience, while accomplishing our core concepts well.

title: GovHack 2020 Team io Liv City
Description: LivCity is an application that allows a city to gain community sources information on selected areas. This app functions by an administrator or researcher selecting an area to question, this could be for example regarding air pollution, traffic, safety, waste and more. Using feedback from the community, the appropriate authorities can develop needed infrastructure in areas or appropriate social services, greatly improving the efficiency, usefulness, and bringing innovation to the community.

title: MQTT Project
Description: This is an encrypted MQTT data transmission project as a part of an IoT project.

title: PC Builder Memory
Description: A simple card matching game in C#. This was written to learn the programming language C#.

title: My Portfolio
Description: This portfolio uses mapping, and mapping within that to acomplish most of its functions. These mapping functions corispond to JSON files holding all the information for future ease of use! It was also developed with mobile devices in mind.
